title: Jumeirah Living World Trade Centre Residence launches ‘Exhibitors’ Package’ - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Jumeirah Living World Trade Centre Residence launches ‘Exhibitors’ Package’ Published on : Wednesday, October 14, 2015
Jumeirah Living World Trade Centre Residence, part of Jumeirah Group, the Dubai-based luxury hotel company and a member of Dubai Holding, has unveiled an exclusive ‘Exhibitors’ Package,’ offering 20% off Best Available Rate.
The property offers covenient access to the Dubai World Trade Centre (DWTC) which hosts more than 500 international events every year. It provides luxurious one, two, three and four-bedroom duplex apartments and the package comprises a number of exclusive benefits.
In addition to 20% off Best Available Rate, exhibitors have access to a number of complimentary services such as: utility rooms for storage, meeting rooms and business centre facilities, internet and printing services, shoe shine service, daily buffet breakfast and wi-fi access. Additional benefits include discounted business lunches, early check-in and late check-out until 4pm (subject to availability), access to a convenience store on site and a 20% discount on food and beverages in selected Jumeirah Restaurants.
An efficient and discreet ‘Lifestyle Team’ is also available, leaving guests free to enjoy the luxury of effortless living. The team can provide essential pre-arrival information on local amenities and services, relocation assistance, meet-and-greet at the airport, airport transfers, visa assistance and apartment set-up with office equipment. The fridge and pantry can be stocked in advance with fresh and dry foods.
The team can provide a location orientation to familiarise guests with the local area and even create a personalised sightseeing itinerary. Additional services include babysitting, pet care, grocery shopping, car and limousine rental, exclusive tours and excursions and restaurant bookings.
